title: Prince of Persia™: The Lost Crown - Mask of Darkness
description:
Mask of Darkness is a story DLC that adds a thrilling new chapter to Sargon’s saga. 
Experience a new story around Radjen, the assassin of the Immortals, as she traps Sargon in her Mind Palace, a nightmarish dimension created with her dark magic.
Explore four biomes filled with new platforming elements, new lethal foes to face, and three epic bosses.
longDescription:
Mask of Darkness is a story DLC that adds a thrilling new chapter to Sargon’s saga. 
Experience a new story around Radjen, the assassin of the Immortals, as she traps Sargon in her Mind Palace, a nightmarish dimension created with her dark magic.

Dive into a new world born from the shadow assassin’s dark past and soul. Discover four surprising and surreal new biomes with more than ten totally new types of platforming elements, including deadly traps and merciless mechanisms. In between platforming sequences, face six otherworldly new enemy archetypes inspired by Radjen’s surreal dreams, as well as three epic bosses. Use newly acquired combat abilities to overcome them. 

• Experience Sargon's darkest quest yet: step away from Mount Qaf to dive into a brand-new story of loss and danger. 
• Uncover Radjen's fate in a story that resolves hanging questions from The Lost Crown's main story.
• Use Sargon’s abilities and Time Powers to navigate this intricate and interconnected new dimension. 
• Experience an improved combat experience with new Amulets to complement Sargon’s arsenal.
• Gain a new outfit for Sargon, inspired by the Immortals’ best. 

Uncover the secrets that lie behind the Mask of Darkness, buried deep within Radjen’s mind!
